heroSubtitle: The most exciting endurance race in Spain.
heroSubtitleBold: 125cc stock motorcycles. 8 hours of pure adrenaline.
historiaContent: Inspired by the legendary FreeTech Endurance format from the UK, we bring to Spain a unique experience: 8 hours of pure competition on stock 125cc motorcycles.
The philosophy is simple but powerful: level the playing field. With identical stock 125cc motorcycles, victory doesn't depend on the biggest budget, but on strategy, consistency, and team passion.
It's the perfect format for amateur teams, riders taking their first steps in competition, and veterans looking for the pure essence of motorsport.

conceptCards.title: Economically accessible
conceptCards.description: No need for big budgets. Affordable bikes, reduced maintenance costs, and competition within everyone's reach.

conceptCards.title: Pure competition
conceptCards.description: With equal machines, the one with the best strategy wins. Rider skill and teamwork make the difference.

conceptCards.title: Team spirit
conceptCards.description: 8 hours can't be raced alone. Coordination, relays, and teamwork are the keys to success.

conceptCards.title: Safety first
conceptCards.description: Controlled speeds that allow competing with greater safety margins without losing any excitement.

conceptCards.title: Rider school
conceptCards.description: The ideal format to learn the basics of competitive riding and take the leap to higher categories.

conceptCards.title: Guaranteed fun
conceptCards.description: Because in the end, that's what it's about: enjoying the competition, camaraderie, and passion for two wheels.

ctaSubtitle: Join the community of riders who are writing the history of 125cc endurance in Spain. Registration is open.
